thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SPS Commerce Q4 Loss Per Share $0.53

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SPS Commerce Q4 Loss Per Share $0.53
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Sps Commerce Inc:
* SPS COMMERCE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.30 TO $0.32 * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.32 TO $1.36 * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.25 * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.53 * SEES Q1 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.14 TO $0.16 * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.67 TO $0.71 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $241 MILLION TO $244 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP ABOUT 10 TO 11 PERCENT * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $57.4 MILLION TO $58.1 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE $58.2 MILLION VERSUS $51.1 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.21, REVENUE VIEW $57.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.24, REVENUE VIEW $58.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.08, REVENUE VIEW $244.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
